title: 'Disappointed with Putin': Trump slams Russian President over Ukraine war

description: Travis Kelce's scary head-first fall during the Chiefs' 30-17 win over the Lions sparked fan concern, with many questioning the lack of immediate concussion evaluation. Despite the alarming incident, Kelce played on, later focusing on the team's tough victory rather than his own safety.

title: Low magnesium: The silent cause behind your poor sleep, anxiety and fatigue
description: Millions of people worldwide struggle with low magnesium, often without realizing it. The deficiency can lead to poor sleep, anxiety, and fatigue. It’s one of the most overlooked nutrients today.

title: Did Mahomes boycott Bad Bunny for Charlie Kirk? Truth explained
description: Viral claims that Patrick Mahomes would boycott the 2026 Super Bowl over Bad Bunny's halftime show and join Turning Point USA are false. Mahomes has made no such statements regarding Bad Bunny or the political group. His wife, Brittany, made a general comment about hate after Charlie Kirk's death, but Mahomes himself remains apolitical.

title: Rebecca J fires back at Offset with claim about Stefon Diggs, Cardi B
description: Rapper Offset faced backlash after implying Instagram model Rebecca J pursued him. Rebecca J responded strongly, calling Offset's actions embarrassing and defending Cardi B. She praised Cardi as self-made and referenced NFL player Stefon Diggs in a viral comment. The internet reacted to Rebecca J's defense and sharp retort, highlighting her confidence and willingness to respond.

title: Digital rights debate: SC rejects doctor’s WhatsApp plea; suggests using Zoho’s Arattai
description: The Supreme Court of India has ruled that access to private messaging platforms like WhatsApp is not a fundamental right, dismissing a doctor's petition to restore her blocked account. The court suggested using alternative apps like Zoho's Arattai, emphasizing users must comply with private platform policies.

title: Jack Roslovic reportedly lost nearly $10M before signing with Oilers
description: Jack Roslovic rejected a significant three-year offer from the Edmonton Oilers. He sought a more lucrative deal elsewhere but remained unsigned for months. The Oilers later offered a one-year contract. Roslovic now aims to impress this season to secure a better deal next summer. This situation highlights the unpredictable nature of NHL contracts.
